scripts.report:allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.test:allure: npx playwright test --reporter=line && ts-node allure-helper.ts && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:history: allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report --clean && cp -r ./allure-report/history ./allure-report-temp || true && allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report && cp -r ./allure-report-temp/history ./allure-report/ || true
scripts.allure:full: npm run test && npm run allure:live
scripts.test:report: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary npx playwright test && Compress-Archive -Path playwright-report -DestinationPath playwright-report.zip -Force; npx ts-node send-report.ts
